channel.title: Client background,
channel.description:
Hi,
Would some one make me a client background? I suck at making them ;)
Server name: Glenn-Scape Server Owner: Glennn8 I got a pic heres a link to the pic http://www.halothemovie.org/wallpapers/halo3.jpg I hope someon will make me a client background, with this background,
Already thanks!
Glenn,
